project_descr: The PalTel Group Foundation will provide support to the procurement of medical supplies (drugs and health consumables) to the Ministry of Health in Gaza.

outputs.output_descr:
The PalTel Group Foundation for Community Development has approached UNDP/PAPP with a request to provide support to the procurement of medical supplies (drugs and health consumables) to the Miniustry of Helath in Gaza as a one-time donation. The list of required items has been prepared and vetted by Ministry of Health in Gaza, reviewed by UNDP/PAPP, and contributes to much-needed medical supplies for hospitals in Gaza, with a particular emphasis on drugs pertaining to oncology (cancer), one of the most widespread non-communicable diseases (NCDs) in Palestine. The initiative, thus, aims to support efforts to ensure that MoH in Gaza has access to the appropriate medical supplies required to support cancer patients.
The management and implementation of the programme will be supported by a Programme Management Unit (PMU) in UNDP/PAPP, including a Programme Manager, Procurement Officer and Finance Officer. This will be covered through an in-kind contribution from UNDP/PAPP's other resources.
